attributes.action: Nationwide cull of alien invasive species
attributes.additional_details:
Alien invasive species are the second biggest threat to wildlife, and more must be done to tackle this very serious threat. Examples include mink and grey squirrels.
There should be a nationwide cull of all alien invasive species.

Government funded trappers should control alien invasive species and assist landowners with control efforts.

Grants should be available to control all alien invasive species, to give landowners an incentive.

There should be an awareness campaign to discourage people from interfering with cull efforts by, for example, vandalising traps and encouraging invasive species (such as by feeding them).
